intent_atoms.description: Ensure VR-002 surfaces deterministic errors whenever a child box extends past its parent's payload range or overlaps previously parsed siblings so downstream CLI/UI surfaces remain trustworthy.
Augmented ContainerBoundaryRule with explicit start/end comparisons, producing dedicated overlap and parent-range overflow diagnostics while keeping container stack recovery logic intact.
Hardened stack accounting to preserve the furthest consumed offset, preventing later children from resetting parent boundaries after overlap detection.
Added negative regression tests in BoxValidatorTests covering oversized children and overlapping siblings; verified the broader suite to guard against regressions in existing structural checks.
Container stack recovery logic must remain intact when detecting overlaps or parent-range overflows.
Use explicit start/end comparisons in ContainerBoundaryRule for overlap and parent-range overflow diagnostics.

functional_units.description: Validates that child boxes stay within parent payload range and do not overlap siblings, producing diagnostics for overflow and overlap.
